settings.title: OUR BESTSELLER
settings.text: Unrestrained is back in stock for a limited time! <3

settings.title: ✨4 New Shades ✨
settings.text: These unique lip shades promise not only to envelop your lips in rich, velvety color that lasts all day but also to serve as a bold statement piece in your makeup arsenal.

settings.quote: I admit, I bought these lipsticks mainly for the novelty of the cigarette design, but I was blown away by the quality of the product itself. Each of the four shades is uniquely flattering, making it hard to choose a favorite. They've become my daily essential.
settings.author: Kaylee L. (IN)

settings.quote: As a makeup enthusiast, I'm always on the lookout for unique products, and these warm-toned lipsticks caught my eye immediately. The packaging is clever and definitely a novelty. The shades are versatile, rich, and have a beautiful matte finish that I love.
settings.author: Brianna T. (LA)

settings.quote: Each shade is perfect for my olive skin tone, offering just the right amount of warmth for any occasion. The formula is creamy, long-lasting, and doesn't dry out my lips, which is a huge plus. It's safe to say, these lipsticks have quickly become my go-to.
settings.author: Shanique S. (CA)

settings.quote: Add customer reviews and testimonials to showcase your store’s happy customers.
